name: helios-network
description: Helios network representation written using wasm

scripts.build: npm run build:es && npm run build:umd && npm run build:prep && npm run build:inline
scripts.build:debug: DEBUG_SYMBOLS=1 vite build && npm run build:es && npm run build:umd && npm run build:prep && npm run build:inline
scripts.build:wasm: PATH=$PWD/node_modules/.bin:$PATH meson setup builddir --cross-file emscripten-cross.txt || true && PATH=$PWD/node_modules/.bin:$PATH meson compile -C builddir
scripts.test:browser: start-server-and-test "PORT=4173 npm run dev -- --port 4173" http://localhost:4173 "BASE_URL=http://localhost:4173 playwright test"
scripts.test:browser:ci: start-server-and-test "PORT=4173 npm run dev -- --port 4173" http://localhost:4173 "BASE_URL=http://localhost:4173 playwright test"
